subject: Soccer
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The United States opened the Olympic qualifying tournament with a 6-0 win over Cuba in Nashville. Joe Corona had a hat trick and the captain Freddy Adu and Juan Agudelo of the Red Bulls also scored.
snippet: The United States opened the Olympic qualifying tournament with a 6-0 win over Cuba in Nashville. Joe Corona had a hat trick and the captain Freddy Adu and Juan Agudelo of the Red Bulls also scored.
